Title: The dentist
Scene: I need to go to the dentist but I don't like being in places with a lot of people.
Lesson: It is important to go to the dentist, even if it is crowded.

Title: Tidy the room
Scene: The room is always messy and the kid doesn't want to tidy it up
Lesson: It is important to clean the room after playing

Title: The bus
Scene: The bus is always crowded and for the kid is hard to stay in crowded places
Lesson: When places are crowded, it is important to stay calm. Think about something you like

Title: Anger
Scene: While playing, the kid gets angry and punches another kid
Lesson: It is important to stay calm and not punch others

Title: Calm down
Scene: The kid is in a stressful situation and keeps shaking the legs
Lesson: Give the kid some suggestions on how to calm down
